title: Chat History & Traceability Policy
description: Rules for identifying, storing, and analyzing the session stream of consciousness.

retrieval_strategy.name: LIFO (Last-In, First-Out)
retrieval_strategy.rule: Prioritize recent high-level summaries, then drill down to granular logs as needed for context efficiency.
retrieval_strategy.rationale: Top-down analysis is more efficient for understanding the current state of the swarm.

steps: Trace up from current shell PID to find the parent agent process.
Identify the 'script' command arguments to find the exact .txt log path.
Verify existence and timestamp to establish the Session ID.

deprecation_notice: .chat/ is obsolete. All active streams must reside in dynamic/stream/ as .txt files.
